title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7821.1 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7821.1 - Application

State Regulations

The standards established by this Subchapter shall apply
to all existing buildings in the State and to any renovation to a lighting
system in an existing building where such lighting system renovation is not
required to conform to the provisions of the State Energy Conservation

Construction Code. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7821.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
